alert.note: Alert for Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 4:45AM EST until December 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation including snow, sleet and freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Windsor County. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wintry mix including snow, sleet, and freezing rain will affect Windsor County early this morning. Freezing rain during the morning commute will make for some slippery surfaces and difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
